sentences.en: A childhood journey sparked his lifelong interest in railways.
sentences.cn: 儿童时代的一次旅行引发了他对铁路持续终生的兴趣.

sentences.en: A moment's error can bring a lifelong regret.
An unmodified attack of measles usually confers lifelong immunity.
sentences.cn: 自然经过的麻疹,一般产生终身免疫.

sentences.en: Building a memorial to Columbus has been his lifelong dream.
sentences.cn: 为哥伦布建一座纪念碑是他一生的梦想。

sentences.en: Capital punishment is claimed to deter wrongdoing even better than lifelong confinement.
sentences.cn: 死刑之所以需要是因为它在制止犯罪方面甚至比终身监禁更有效.

sentences.en: David finally realized his lifelong ambition.
sentences.cn: 戴维终于实现了他毕生的抱负。

sentences.en: He and the young musician became lifelong friends.
sentences.cn: 后来他和这位小音乐家成了莫逆之交.

sentences.en: He has had a keen and lifelong interest in astrological research.
sentences.cn: 他毕生热衷于占星术研究。

sentences.en: He's been a lifelong sufferer from hay fever.
I formed my lifelong opinions about money.
sentences.cn: 我对金钱产生了永生不渝的想法.

sentences.en: I've had a lifelong fascination with the sea and with small boats.
sentences.cn: 我一生都对大海和小船着迷。

sentences.en: It caused a lifelong breach with his father.
sentences.cn: 这使得他们父子终身失和.

sentences.en: Laying a solid foundation for learning will be of great lifelong benefit to you.
sentences.cn: 学问要有根底,根底要打得平正坚实,以后永远受用.

sentences.en: Seriously poisoned individuals are considered lifelong cripples.
sentences.cn: 严重中毒的人被认为是终身瘸子.

sentences.en: She became a lifelong friend of ours.
sentences.cn: 她成了我们一辈子的朋友。
